title: Beans and Dodo
instructions:
Instructions

What to do with the stuff to be making the meal, the meal being of course Jollof rice and plantain.
ingredients:
Stuff to go into the making

A set of stuff what goes in to make said meal, said meal being Jollof rice and plantain.
about: Black-Eyed or Brown beans are rich in high quality protein which provides a healthy alternative to meat and other animal protein. Nigerian Beans (Ewa) is delicious on its own or when accompanied with various other foods such as Nigerian fried plantain (Dodo) or boiled Yam. One of Nigeriaâ€™s everyday foods and it is easy to prepare as you can see below.
strapline: Nigerian Fried Beans is so delicious that even those who do not like beans enjoy it
